products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe Powder Blue Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Faux suede deluxe powder blue roman blind in blue. Made to measure from 15.58 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their faux suede deluxe range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains. 
 The faux suede deluxe powder blue roman blind in a lovely colour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. 
 
 Product id: db-rom0012 fabric colour: powder blue material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe New Grey Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Faux suede deluxe new grey roman blind in grey. Made to measure from 15.58 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Chic and on trend for today's living, the new grey faux suede blind will enhance your room interior. 
 
Its trending grey tone brings a crisp classy look that is perfect for any room in your home. Pair it perfectly with several colour palettes, including blush pinks, mustard yellows, and whites. 
 
This blind is great along side co-ordinating and contrasting curtains to give your window that perfect look. Why not try their free samples service to take advantage of mixing colours and textures to create that perfect look for your home? 
 
All their blinds are handmade right here in their uk factory by their highly skilled team so you can rest assured knowing that a perfect blind made to the highest standards will be making its way to you.
